question: Who has been appointed the new chairman of International Fertiliser Association (IFA)?
explanation: Rakesh Kapur, Joint Managing Director of Indian Farmers Fertiliser Cooperative Limited (IFFCO) has been elected as the new Chairman of the International Fertilizer Association (IFA) at the 2017 IFA annual conference in Marrakech, Morocco. He is also the Chairman of the Fertiliser Association of India (FAI). With this, Kapoor has become the third Indian to hold this prestigious position in IFA\'s 90 years\' history. The Paris-based IFA is the global fertiliser association with 500 members representing 68 countries, including 24 members from India.
